root: ^Two tunnels split before you. Each leads further into the complex network of caverns and corridors. What will you do?

left: ^Following the broken-down tracks, you walk into the leftmost tunnel. As your feet carry you forward, the space widens into a large hexagonal cavern.

^A central pillar branches out towards the six corners of the room, its rotting wood visibly struggling with the stone weight above, keeping the ceiling from collapsing in on the large, crypt-like structure below.
kick: ^You kick the pillar and the room trembles, threatening to collapse in on itself!

c-7: ^Panicked, you rush towards the exit. Rubble falls around you as you dive into the open doorway and the tunnel collapsed behind you.
c-8: ^Rocks pelt your body, leaving ugly bruises as you flee back across the chamber. The chamber collapses behind you, and you suck in ragged breaths in the utter blackness.

crypt: ^Thin tendrils of gold gleam out from underneath the crypt's door. Despite it's size, it slides open remarkably easy. As you set your eyes on the prize behind, an angry howl suddenly drives you back as you reach for your [[weapon]].
postcombat: ^As the ghostly figure disappears, the crypt now stands unprotected and its treasures yours to take.
right: ^Hugging the rightmost wall, you enter a dark corridor illuminated by scattered pieces of glowing crystal.
findamber: ^Picking up a piece of the orange crystal, you feel various foreign sensations pulse through your mind. With some difficulty, you discern a distinct desire to acquire more of the crystal.

c-16: ^You stow the Amber, feeling it burn just ever so slightly inside your pocket.

putdown: ^You put the Amber back down, sensing something very wrong about the strange crystal.
narrowtunnel: ^You continue forward and the walls of the corridor narrow. Closing in on you with each step you take, until you can no longer fit through.

c-20: ^You nimbly maneuver yourself through the narrow passage and reach the other side unscathed.
c-21: ^You find a nice hefty rock, and smash your way through the passage, widening it until you can pass through unscathed.
c-22: ^You angle yourself to push through the narrow passage, only to find yourself well and truly stuck.

c-23: ^After abandoning some of your gear, you tumble out at the far end of the tunnel.

treasure: ^The Amber gleams more potently, the warm hues reflected by the veins of pure gold coursing through the crystalline formations.
leave: ^You reconsider your venture into the dark mineshafts. Perhaps there is another way back to the surface?
^At last, the familiar warm tones of the crystal illuminate the widening walls of the cavern once more. You seem to have made it through the maze of tunnels.
